# Propogation-Loss-2022

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This is the repository for the the cross-site Borneo propagation loss study. 

Script functionalities include:  
- processing sound data using Raven selection tables (RunganPropogationLoss and MaliauPropagationLoss)  
- calculating propagation loss and model selection (Rungan/Maliau Prop Loss and Modeling)  
- plotting background noise levels
